ivardefs.name: criteria
ivardefs.desc: The name of a valid referenced CQL expression (may be namespaced) that defines this population criteria.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: The human readable description of this population criteria.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier for the population criteria. This identifier is used to report data against this criteria within the measure report.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Optional name or short description of this population.

properties.desc: A population criteria for the measure.
